description: A Spring Boot REST controller defining basic endpoints for the product API backend, including welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for health checks, API info, and documentation redirection.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a greeting message for the root endpoint.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI for API documentation.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides application information such as its name.
